Coding is the process of using a programming language to give instructions to a computer.
HTML stands for HyperText Markup Language, used to create the structure of web pages.
CSS is used to style and design web pages.
JavaScript is a language that adds interactivity to websites.
Start with basics like HTML/CSS, then move to JavaScript. Follow Dev-Release for more tips!
